text: The women's duet was one of two events in the synchronised swimming program at the 1988 Summer Olympics. The final was held on 1 October. ==Results== ===Qualification=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Country !Athlete !Technical !Free !Total |-bgcolor=ccffcc |
